attributes.action: To prevent the cancellation of BBC political discussion programme "This Week"
attributes.background: It is the only weekly digest of information on Brexit, from all political sides, with an unbiased chair. It must run until Brexit is resolved.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is independent of government and the government cannot intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations. 

You can find out how to make a complaint to the BBC here: 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
